entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Moncton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5 except zero along parts of the coast.

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in low lying areas.

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning then northeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 13 March 2023
